TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICallbackContainer

summary.span: 定义一个方法，使控件能够获取回调脚本。

span.span: Defines a method that enables controls to obtain a callback script.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现接口提供使用脚本将启动到服务器的回调的控件。Classes that implement the interface provide controls with a script that will initiate a callback to the server. 回调与之更常见的回发，在页面处理工作的回调中重新创建该页，而无需更改的页包含的状态信息。A callback differs from the more common postback in that the page processing for the callback recreates the page without changing state information held by the page. 创建回叫的详细信息，请参阅[实现客户端回调而不回发](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185)。For more information on creating callbacks, see [Implementing Client Callbacks Without Postbacks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185). 类实现接口还应实现接口以处理控件引发的事件。Classes that implement the interface should also implement the interface to handle the events raised by controls.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetCallbackScript (System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl buttonControl, string argument);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetCallbackScript(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl buttonControl, string argument) cil managed
Public Function GetCallbackScript (buttonControl As IButtonControl, argument As String) As String
abstract member GetCallbackScript : System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl * string -> string

span.span: The control initiating the callback request.

param.name: argument
param.span: 用于生成回调脚本的参数。

span.span: The arguments used to build the callback script.

summary.span: 创建一个脚本，以便启动针对 Web 服务器的客户端回调。

span.span: Creates a script for initiating a client callback to a Web server.

returns.span: 在客户端运行时，将启动针对 Web 服务器回调的脚本。

span.span: A script that, when run on a client, will initiate a callback to the Web server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现方法应返回的脚本，在客户端上运行时将启动针对 Web 服务器的回调。Implementations of the method should return a script that, when run on the client, will initiate a callback to the Web server. `argument`参数传递给处理回调的方法。The `argument` parameter is passed to the method that handles the callback. 创建回叫的详细信息，请参阅[实现客户端回调而不回发](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185)。For more information on creating callbacks, see [Implementing Client Callbacks Without Postbacks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185).
